positions.description: Products:1. Account Connect2. Enrollment Hub - Phase 23. Amex Passport1. Sized out the relevant customer segment for phase 2 of Enrollment Hub Launch, to be targeted via marketing campaigns for Enrollments. positions.title: Assistant Manager - Digital Product Analytics
positions.description_html:
Products:
1. Account Connect
2. Enrollment Hub - Phase 2
3. Amex Passport

1. Sized out the relevant customer segment for phase 2 of Enrollment Hub Launch, to be targeted via marketing campaigns for Enrollments. The launch was supported with immediate early readouts to assess the initial performance of the product.

2. Launched the first account connect triggers as an actionable insight brought out of the customer profiling exercise to ensure early activation and engagement.

3. Leading the cross-functional forum with product partners to launch another nascent product.

positions.subtitle: American Express
positions.description: Working as a part of the Digital Labs Analytics team which provides analytical and strategic support to new digital products/features in their pilot and growth phases, aimed at enhancing the overall digital experience of our customers.Products: 1. Send and Split (Peer to Peer Payments)2. Amex Account Connect3. Enrollment Hub - Phase 11. Identified customer segments within the P2P userbase to be targeted for re-activation along with the engagement of idle users to increase the MAU of the product.2. Revamped the reporting of Account Connect via a deep dive on data sources and logics to uncover missing segments in the customer funnel, leading to an overall ~120% increase in report coverage of total incoming enrollment attempts. Done with continuous knowledge sharing with from tech and product partners to come-up with the complete understanding of backend dataflows crucial to redefine new logics. Earned special recognition for this contribution.3.  Did the customer profiling of Amex Connect Users, to highlight the opportunity for quicker activations and also provided the recommendation for journey extender for multi-partner provisions, which was later seen as the main theme of Enrollment Hub.4. Provided and owned the end-to-end launch support by analytics to the new product Enrollment Hub to ensure efficient and accurate post-launch metric and customer journey funnel tracking.
positions.title: Associate - Digital Product Analytics
positions.description_html:
Working as a part of the Digital Labs Analytics team which provides analytical and strategic support to new digital products/features in their pilot and growth phases, aimed at enhancing the overall digital experience of our customers.

Products:
1. Send and Split (Peer to Peer Payments)
2. Amex Account Connect
3. Enrollment Hub - Phase 1

1. Identified customer segments within the P2P userbase to be targeted for re-activation along with the engagement of idle users to increase the MAU of the product.

2. Revamped the reporting of Account Connect via a deep dive on data sources and logics to uncover missing segments in the customer funnel, leading to an overall ~120% increase in report coverage of total incoming enrollment attempts. Done with continuous knowledge sharing with from tech and product partners to come-up with the complete understanding of backend dataflows crucial to redefine new logics. Earned special recognition for this contribution.

3. Did the customer profiling of Amex Connect Users, to highlight the opportunity for quicker activations and also provided the recommendation for journey extender for multi-partner provisions, which was later seen as the main theme of Enrollment Hub.

4. Provided and owned the end-to-end launch support by analytics to the new product Enrollment Hub
to ensure efficient and accurate post-launch metric and customer journey funnel tracking.

positions.subtitle: Spectra - IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: Spectra is a group of passionate students motivated towards fine arts and painting within the campus of Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur.  We as members are responsible for conducting various fine arts and modelling events in the campus like workshops on various art forms, events and maintain both offline and online reach. Our major events include Artbud and ArtBeat, the annual art exhibition of IIT Kharagpur.

experience.title: Data Science Intern

publications: [{"title":"Molecular Insights into the Effect of Crystal Planes on Droplet Wetting","subtitle":"Langmuir","date":"March 20, 2023"},{"title":"A Prototype of an Intelligent Ground Vehicle for constrained environment: Design and Development","subtitle":"ICCRT 2019: Proceedings of the 2019 2nd International Conference on Control and Robot Technology","date":"December 1, 2019","description":"Autonomous vehicles are bound to take over the urban road scenario in the near future. While fully autonomous driving is yet to be deployed on urban roads unconditionally, constrained environments provide an opportunity for preliminary testing and validation as the technology emerges. Autonomous robots can be tuned to be robust in constrained environments. The technologies developed can then be extended and transferred to unconstrained environments with required safety precautions. This paper describes the design, development and testing of EKLAVYA 7.0, an autonomous differential drive robot that can follow lanes while avoiding stationary obstacles as well as navigate through a series of land markings specified by GPS coordinates. It was developed to participate in the 27th Intelligent Ground Vehicle Competition (IGVC 2019). The paper describes the overall mechanical, embedded and software architecture developed for this constrained environment along with system integration, testing and results."}]
